data.comment: The match is underway. Bournemouth have kicked-off.
George Saville (Middlesbrough) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 38, Bournemouth take a 0-1 lead thanks to Dominic Solanke.
Matt Donohue blows to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Middlesbrough - Middlesbrough with the kick-off.
In the minute 51, Chris Mepham (Bournemouth) has received a first yellow card.
Bournemouth's Jack Stacey has been booked in Middlesbrough.
The home team replace Ashley Fletcher with Marcus Browne.
In the minute 73, Philip Billing is replacing Arnaut Danjuma for the away team.
Diego Rico Salguero is replacing Jack Stacey for Bournemouth at Riverside.
Marcus Browne (Middlesbrough) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Riverside.
In the minute 84, Jason Tindall (Bournemouth) is making a third substitution, with Sam Surridge replacing David Brooks.
Dael Fry is on a sub for Djed Spence for Middlesbrough.
Middlesbrough make their third substitution with Sam Morsy replacing Marcus Tavernier.
